feed.title: Public Comments Archive: #71 SAGA Python Bindings

entry.title: #71 SAGA Python Bindings: time types etc.
entry.content: The bindings fail to specify if and how attributes can be expressed as native python types.

entry.title: #71 SAGA Python Bindings: Document is in public comment until July 20th, 2013
entry.content:
Document Links:

  • [pdf]
  • Comment Here

Abstract:

This document provides information to the grid community, proposing a standard for a Python language binding to the Simple API for Grid Applications
(SAGA). As a SAGA language binding, it depends upon the SAGA Core API Specification, the currently defined SAGA API extension packages, and on the draft Resource API Extension.
